tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Coming Home
programme.desc: A marine’s killing in Iraq has ramifications for JAG stateside as Harm helps the soldier’s family with a media onslaught, and Bud and Mac investigate the failure of his flack vest.

programme.title: JAG: Fighting Words
programme.desc: A general’s comments about Islam during a church service pit Harm and Mac against each other as a court-martial hearing examines whether those remarks were a danger to national security.

programme.title: JAG: One Big Boat
programme.desc: When a Naval Academy sailing team gets caught in a squall and a team member drowns, Mac and Turner must determine if their driven commander willingly put his crew at risk.

programme.title: JAG: Death At The Mosque
programme.desc: Vukovic is sent to Iraq to defend a Marine who was caught on tape killing a seemingly innocent Iraqi civilian.

programme.title: JAG: Recovery
programme.desc: A Navy astronaut dies during a drill while preparing for a space mission to repair a satellite.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Prisoner
programme.desc: Chicom agents capture Harm in Hong Kong; they vigorously question him in mainland China about official matters.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Ares
programme.desc: Someone kills a Naval officer on Okinawa, then his ship encounters major trouble during war games at sea.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Skeleton Crew
programme.desc: The body of a woman Naval officer, a friend, and classmate of Harm, is found ashore.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Trinity
programme.desc: Harm and his new partner, Marine Major Sara MacKenzie are drawn into a game of revenge when they're sent to Belfast, Ireland, to represent the legal interests of a Navy Lieutenant whose infant son has seemingly been abducted.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Robots
programme.desc: Walter, Cabe, and Happy are trapped with the crew in a top-secret submarine when an explosion sends it to the bottom of the ocean with limited oxygen.

programme.title: Scorpion: Super Fun Guys
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover on the "Super Fun Guy" movie set in Kazakstan in order to disable a Soviet-era nuclear missile being sold by terrorists.

programme.title: Scorpion: Tech, Drugs, and Rock 'n Roll
programme.desc: Walter's attempt to "normalize" goes horribly wrong when a nefarious virus is uploaded to his computer.

programme.title: Scorpion: Crazy Train
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must stop a sabotaged runaway subway train with Paige and Ralph on board. Also, in his attempt to impress Happy, Toby has his first boxing match.

programme.title: Scorpion: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must find a boy from Ralph's class who goes missing on a field trip after he accidentally has a run-in with a deadly criminal. Also, Toby gets closer to finding out the identity of Happy's husband.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Plight At The Museum
programme.desc: Team Scorpion's simple job at the Los Angeles Natural History Museum turns deadly when they discover thieves robbing a rare gem exhibit in order to get materials needed to enrich a nuclear bomb.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Bat Poop Crazy
programme.desc: Before Halloween, Team Scorpion must infiltrate a deep, vast cave system in order to prevent a bat population from destroying the North America ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Vote
programme.sub-title: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Vote
programme.desc: On Election Day, as democracy hangs in the balance, Team Scorpion is called on when someone tries to throw the U.S. presidential election into chaos.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Sly And The Family Stone
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion travels to Ireland for Megan's one-year memorial, Walter discovers that a nearby lake's natural disaster has created a poisonous cloud that could kill everyone in the village.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Mother Load
programme.desc: Paige's estranged mother calls on Team Scorpion when she accidentally uncovers a forgotten nuclear reactor on the verge of exploding.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Honour Roll
programme.desc: After their High School Outreach assignment goes awry, Andy and Chris stumble on the victim of avicious beating behind a nightclub.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Girlfriend of the Year
programme.desc: After a routine speed trap leads to a messy accident on a city highway, Chris and Gail find one of the cars mysteriously empty and quickly realize that itslicense plate matches the one being broadcast in a citywide “Amber Alert”.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Big Nickel
programme.desc: Andy’s attempt to avoid Swarek is thwarted whenbothare assigned to a prisoner transport. When things go awry and theinmate breaks loose, the two officers are led on a cat-and-mouse foot chase through the meandering woods.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: To Serve or Protect
programme.desc: What was to be a routine day for Andy is abruptly put on holdwhen herex-copper father, Tommy, confesses that he might have committed a serious crime during one of his alcohol-induced blackouts.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Bullet Proof
programme.desc: Andy’s romance with Det. Luke Callaghan gets complicated when he chooses her for a special assignment -serving a search warrant for a bullet lodged in the head of a witness to murder.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Hot & Bothered
programme.desc: A severe heat wave wreaks havoc on the city, forcing the rookies to work around the clock to keep the peace. In the midst of the chaos, Andy discovers that a serial rapist may have resurfaced to prey on vulnerable teenage girls.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Honour Roll
programme.desc: After their High School Outreach assignment goes awry, Andy and Chris stumble on the victim of avicious beating behind a nightclub.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Girlfriend of the Year
programme.desc: After a routine speed trap leads to a messy accident on a city highway, Chris and Gail find one of the cars mysteriously empty and quickly realize that itslicense plate matches the one being broadcast in a citywide “Amber Alert”.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Big Nickel
programme.desc: Andy’s attempt to avoid Swarek is thwarted whenbothare assigned to a prisoner transport. When things go awry and theinmate breaks loose, the two officers are led on a cat-and-mouse foot chase through the meandering woods.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: To Serve or Protect
programme.desc: What was to be a routine day for Andy is abruptly put on holdwhen herex-copper father, Tommy, confesses that he might have committed a serious crime during one of his alcohol-induced blackouts.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Armely Mills Cottage
programme.desc: The cottage on the site of Armley Mills is said to be full of paranormal activity so Karl decides to enter, alone and witnesses something that is eager to grab his attention.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Beaumanor Hall
programme.desc: Karl ventures, alone, to the upper floors of this large mansion and id stalked by something that wants to be heard.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall
programme.desc: Yvette takes Glen and Mary into the incredibly haunted Bishton Hall. They start in the upper floors and work their way down to the cellars, but is something following them.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall P1
programme.desc: Stuart investigates the main house and seems to be pulled in different directions from an unexplained energy.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall P2
programme.desc: Karl ventures down into the cellars of this large country house and soon comes under attack from an unseen force.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Borwick Hall P1
programme.desc: Karl enters Borwick Hall for the first time as he investigates the upper floors.

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team continue their investigation into this mysterious place. With something seemingly stalking the crew the night ends with a particularly vigorous spirit in a very small room.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Leeds Town Hall
programme.desc: Karl ventures alone into the underneath Leeds Town Hall into the dark prison cells that is said to be haunted by a plethora of unhappy spirits, one doesn’t seem happy that Karl is there.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Margam Castle P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the ground floor back rooms of this landmark castle alone, but soon realises that something is lurking in the shadows.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Margam Castle P2
programme.desc: The upper floors of Margam Castle are said to be haunted by many different spirits, Stuart goes it alone to try and find them.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Nunnington Hall Pt1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the upper floors of this large manor house that is said to be swarming with paranormal activity of every kind, and gets more than he bargained for.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Nunnington Hall Pt2
programme.desc: The creaky corridors and old rooms of Nunnington Hall have many stories of ghosts and phantoms, Stuart investigates the middle floors and starts to experience unexplained happenings.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House
programme.desc: Karl & Stuart investigate the top floor of this grand Welsh house. The stories of paranormal activity soon come to life as the duo are surrounded by strange occurrences.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the outbuildings of this large estate, where many people have witnessed strange occurrences, some he is about to witness first-hand.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Paranormal Politics
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads down South to help two different families find some closure. First stop is Baton Rouge, Louisiana to investigate the Old State Capital Building, which has endured theCivil War and a congressman's death.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 9
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Tunnels of Terror
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Lockport, New York to investigate an underworld of tunnels. It holds a mystery of possible murder, multiple deaths and frightening phenomena. What stories do the spirits of Lockport Caves want to tell?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Prescription For Fear
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Bartonville, Illinois to investigate the Peoria Asylum.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Paranormal Pioneers
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Gloucester, Massachusetts to investigate Hammond Castle.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Harvesting Murder
programme.desc: A sugar plantation worker tied his daughter to a bed and went to work. Unable to escape, she died in a fire. Claims from the staff of Hawaii's Plantation Village in Waipahu.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fighting Spirit
programme.desc: TAPS has been called to investigate a historic armory. An upcoming renovation has those involved fearful the construction might provoke lingering spirits attached to artifacts with documented violent pasts.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Shards of Rimni
programme.desc: Dylan is framed for murder and must clear his name while finding the pieces of a vase said to grant the owner the "blessings of the cosmos.

programme.title: Andromeda: Mad to Be Saved
programme.desc: The crew rescues a group of refugees, only to discover they have been subject to government experiments and are extremely unstable.

programme.title: Andromeda: Cui Bono
programme.desc: Beka's uncle runs for office in the New Commonwealth, but an assassination attempt causes the crew to act as his security.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Lone and Level Sands
programme.desc: When the Andromeda is attacked by space pirates, they are rescued by a long-lost spaceship from Earth.

programme.title: Andromeda: Double or Nothingness
programme.desc: Dylan is kidnapped by Nietscheans and forced to play mind games for the amusement of his captors.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Two Nietzschean siblings are in a stand-off over a weapon that can eliminate higher brain functions.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Soon the Nearing Vortex
programme.desc: Tyr returns, having joined with the Collectors and demands the route of ages from his former crewmates.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The World Turns All Around Her
programme.sub-title: The World Turns All Around Her
programme.desc: A hostage situation ensues when the crew confronts Tyr.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Conduit to Destiny
programme.desc: A wrong turn in the slipstream leads Andromeda to a prison riot.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.88
programme.desc: An alleged loan to pay off a sports gambling debt is disputed by ex- friends who disagree about whether or not they dated/A woman is suing her former friend for an alleged loan to catch-up on his delinquent truck payments.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.153
programme.desc: An incident of road rage escalates when a woman blows a kiss and laughs as she crosses the path of an angry, frustrated driver.\t\t\t\r\nClaiming she was kicked out illegally, a woman refuses to pay for rent and living expenses.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.34
programme.desc: Mother falsely accused of child abuse by ex-husband, his mother, and roommate/Case dismissed after 17 abuse reports/Man sues great nephew for jeep damage; nephew claims fun spin caused crash.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.250
programme.desc: A teenager's friend faces accusations of drinking, driving, and crashing a stolen golf cart; he blames the teenager's mother for providing alcohol. Two brothers fight over damages to a home allegedly caused by domestic violence.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.180
programme.desc: A 66-year-old analyst for the U.S. Department of Defense claims he\t\t\t\r\nwas intimate with a 27-year-old sports bar worker and that she owes\t\t\t\r\nhim money. She denies his claims.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.166
programme.desc: Woman faces lawsuit for unpaid bail from speeding with suspended license. Man sues ex for car loan balance; she countersues for job loss.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.19
programme.desc: Man alleges ex-girlfriend ordered escort attack in bar; she denies and countersues for dirt bike balance, car vandalism, and harassment/Trashed hotel room after 18th birthday sparks damages lawsuit.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.138
programme.desc: Pit bull terrier attacks family in park; owner accused of intoxication and starting fight. Woman loans man thousands after rehab; he claims affair and gifts.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.111
programme.desc: A woman admits to wielding a knife but not to scratching her ex- stepbrother’s car/A woman demands compensation after a young house sitter allegedly damages her home and belongings when she broke the rules and brought her cat along.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.35
programme.desc: Man spends life savings to bring children to US, they sue each other over car insurance and repossession/Single mothers move in together, dispute unpaid rent, utility bills, and alleged house damage.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.51
programme.desc: Young nurse sues ex-boyfriend for damages, Dodge Durango payments, motorcycle damages, and unpaid cell phone charges/Woman sues evicted friend and child for back rent, countersued for belongings left behind.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.6
programme.desc: Teen catfight leads to adult feud over truck vandalism/Teen crashes car after drunk 17-year-old allegedly permits him, sued by her father.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.203
programme.desc: A Malibu man claiming he was tired of being a “cabana boy” for his older girlfriend is sued for allegedly stealing her tools and making unauthorized charges on her credit card.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.236
programme.desc: Ex-fiancés from rehab fight publicly and clash in court over an arrest, property return, and a dog. A 19-year-old sues her mother for spending a dog bite settlement check.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.235
programme.desc: A woman sues her sister's ex for repossessing a Chevy Yukon; he alleges stolen tags. Exes argue over a bite mark and sue for car damages, a lease, and unpaid vet bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.82
programme.desc: Two sisters sue a family member for allegedly selling their third\t\t\t\r\nsister’s belongings at a garage sale while she was incarcerated/An allegedly unpaid loan for breast augmentation further divides a woman and her estranged daughter-in-law.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.211
programme.desc: Convicted of first-degree assault after an altercation at a bar, a man is sued by his ex-girlfriend who bailed him out of jail.\t\t\t\r\nAn alleged assault between former college dorm mates, a cycle of harassment, and a damaged computer are disputed.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.188
programme.desc: A troubled teen is at the center of a dispute between a woman and her son-in-law’s daughter over the cost of two airplane tickets to Pittsburgh.\t\t\t\r\nA woman sues her son-in-law’s granddaughter for money loaned to buy a mobile home.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.246
programme.desc: Racial slurs and violent threats emerge as a woman and her father sue a family member for incomplete home renovations. Meanwhile, friends swap cell phones, but a defective device complicates the arrangement.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.197
programme.desc: Woman sues child's father for PlayStation III balance and harassment. 'Good Samaritan' sues former friend for student loan balance.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: One of the chefs changes teams and each team must prepare three lobster dishes in an hour. Another chef faces elimination and has to leave at the end of the day.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining six chefs must turn leftovers into meals in 30 minutes, and the winning team gets a chance for revenge on chef Ramsay. Poor communication may signal the end for one contestant.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay combines the remaining five chefs into one team; the chefs must compete head-to-head with individual dishes to impress trendsetters. Two contestants have a heated power-struggle and chef Ramsay makes a heartfelt offer.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining three chefs must transform classic American dishes into entrées worthy of fine dining; the contestants' mothers vote on their favourite entrées without knowing who made them; chef Ramsay chooses the two finalists.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must prepare food for a bar mitzvah. After one contestant is eliminated, the top 10 chefs are revealed.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams try their hands at tapas-style dining using the day's leftovers and one chef's mistake nearly sabotages both teams' performances.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay tests the chefs' palates. Celebrity diners Eric McCormack and Robert Patrick stop by for dinner, bringing tensions to a boil.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Each team must present chef Ramsay with a dish made with king crab; each team gets to create their own menus for the dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Each chef must use 14 ingredients to create a dish to impress chef Ramsay; one chef is sent to the medic.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) City Councillor and TTC Chair Karen Stintz goes undercover inside the country's largest mass transit system to get her hands dirty with some of the toughest and grittiest jobs.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Matt's Back
programme.desc: Froy and Mike, the new guy, repo a car at a paintball range. When the scene gets out of control, Matt swoops in out of nowhere and saves the day. Then, Sonia and Froy repo a high-end luxury sedan from a snooty pair of Brits in the high-rent district.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Burgers, Bottles, and Hustlers
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia repo a compact sedan from a trio of gun-wielding, bottle-breaking gangsta gals. Then, Matt and Froy get some fast food when they deal with an irate burger-slinger who won't honor Matt's order for his car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Strapped on the Court
programme.desc: Matt and Froy have to choose between the job and their lives when they're confronted by a dozen gun-toting basketball players. Then, Lou and Sonia have to crash a night-time family reunion to get their car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Role-players and Blade Swayers
programme.desc: Lou, Matt, and Froy get interrupted on a routine job by a registered owner with an unregistered blade. Then, Matt and Froy head out to the country to reclaim a Prius from a quintet of socially maladapted role-players.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Caught with Their Pants Down
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy's relationship takes a strange turn on a repo that puts them face-to-face with two strangers caught with their pants down. Then, Lou and Lyndah head to a remote ranch where they confront a duo of indecent roughnecks.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Honor Rolling Away
programme.desc: Sonia and Lyndah find themselves at a local University trying to reclaim a car from a not-so-honorable honor roll student with a squeaky voice. Then, Matt and Sonia are tasked with snagging a tricked-out race car from two vested thugs armed with golf club.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Tazed and Amazed
programme.desc: Matt and Froy need to call in the cops to help out with an inebriated old-timer armed with a tazer. Then, on a journey for a Journey, Lou and Froy battle with a bowler. And finally, Froy and Lyndah deal with a back-peddling super-sized owner of a Nissan A.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Intoxicated Marina Idiots
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia are on a hunt for a 2007 Porsche & a 2008 Audi from the same drug dealing debtor. Next, Matt and Froy pry a truck from a group of intoxicated idiots at a marina. And finally, Matt and Lou hit up an upscale Glendale neighborhood to...

programme.title: Operation Repo: This Is No Fantasy
programme.desc: First, Froy and Lyndah get a tip from a spotter that leads them to a late model sedan with cans tied to the bumper and an angry bride in the passenger side. Next, Matt has to step in when Froy starts to lose it with a group of fantasy football players.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Missing RV and the Private Jet
programme.sub-title: The Missing RV and the Private Jet
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Froy track down an RV that has been missing for 30 years, only to find that its owner is using it to cart around a group of impetuous young Canadian rock stars.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Pyramid Scams and Princesses
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Matt wrangle with two belligerent truckers who will stop at nothing to protect their massive tractor-trailer. Next, a young girl learns that she's been a victim of a pyramid scam when Lyndah and Lou come for her car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Jet Skis and Massages
programme.desc: First, the team heads to the beach to grab a little sun as well as two luxury jet skis. Then, Lou and Froy get in touch with their sensitive side when they confront a massage therapist who's as skilled with her hands as she is with her feet.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Get That Prowler
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Froy unfurl an elaborate sting when they repo a taxicab by tricking its driver into picking them up. But what to do with his ferociously inebriated client? Then, Matt and Froy attempt to repo a DeLorean.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Up Up and Away
programme.desc: First, it's up, up, and away, for Lou, Froy, and Matt. All of their skills are tested when they attempt to take down not one, but two hot air balloons. Then, Lou and Froy find themselves in the wrong part of town, repo'ing a sports car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Family Drama
programme.desc: First, Lou, Froy, and Matt team up with Eva, an alluring lending agent, who sets up a sting to repo a limousine from its delinquent owner.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Kegger and Refrigerator
programme.desc: First, Lyndah has some tension with Frankie when they repo a truck from a moving company in the middle of relocating some fragile material for a very important client. Then, Froy, Sonia, and Frankie crash a raging kegger in a bad part of town.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Going Green and Falling Down
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy arrive on the scene to a repo a car that's been refitted to run on biodiesel and are shocked to see that its owner shares some of Sonia's features.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Look What You Did!
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy get locked in the battle of a lifetime with a pair of young debtors who are understandably upset that their late-model Tahoe has found its way to the bottom of a lake. Is it Froy's fault, as they claim, or are there other forces at..(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Power Couple
programme.desc: Jeff is threatened when Audrey gets a raise and makes almost as much as he does. Meanwhile, Russell enlists Timmy to find out what Liz sees in another man.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Double Down
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey panic when they are told they might be having twins. Meanwhile, Russell throws a citizenship party for Timmy to impress a girl.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cheating
programme.desc: Audrey tries to persuade Jeff to eat healthier when he is diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he can’t help sneaking around with Brenda for unhealthy food.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt, as suggested by Adam. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy’s help in finding it.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.sub-title: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.desc: Russell books a cruise that he thinks is filled with 'red hot' ladies but instead, it's filled with ladies from the Red Hat society. Meanwhile, Timmy tries to help Jeff and Audrey settle an argument.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dirty Talk
programme.desc: Russell tries to get out of his marriage to an overly enthused Liz, who tries to make it work, while Jeff attempts to engage Audrey in dirty talk.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bros Before Nodes
programme.desc: Worried about getting his father's approval, Russell gets Liz all dolled up to meet him.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey Is Dumb
programme.desc: Jeff celebrates Audrey's inability to talk after her node removal surgery. Russell gets Timmy to fire an employee for him, and Adam discovers he's only getting free stuff because of his good looks.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Visit from Fay
programme.desc: A visit from Adam's free-spirited mother puts Jennifer's patience to the test and teaches Russell an embarrassing lesson about 'art'. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey find themselves enjoying alternative forms of entertainment.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Time Share
programme.desc: Jeff makes plans to take Audrey away for the weekend to a fancy hotel, even though they’ll have to sit through a time share presentation to get a great deal.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jen at Work
programme.desc: Adam suggests that Jen do some freelance graphic design work for the company but Russell isn't crazy about the idea.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Optimal Male
programme.desc: Jeff's drive to be labeled an 'optimal male' on his life-insurance physical leads him to some extreme behavior, while Adam's over-friendliness with an ex-girlfriend unsettles Jennifer.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Father's Son
programme.desc: Russell puts on a show to impress his father when he comes to town, but both he and Adam learn the meaning of a parent's tough love. Meanwhile, an 'accident' in their apartment forces Adam and Jennifer to invade Audrey and Jeff's bathroom.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Buyer's Remorse
programme.desc: Jennifer and Adam attempt to practice fiscal responsibility as they consider buying their apartment. Audrey and Jeff offer to write their letter of recommendation, but end up making matters worse when they have a run-in with the landlady.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Pimp My Bride
programme.desc: Russell reluctantly agrees to host a photo shoot in his apartment for Audrey's magazine, with the hope of landing a date with a hot model. Adam steps in to play the groom in Audrey's wedding-themed shoot.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff’s New Friend
programme.desc: Jeff is surprised when Audrey informs him that the new friend he made at the gym is gay. Meanwhile, Russell worries the young woman he's dating might be his daughter.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Voluntary Commitment
programme.desc: After a long line of female assistants, Russell learns that having a male assistant can be very advantageous. Meanwhile, after volunteering to read to the elderly, Audrey makes a bet with Jeff that she can commit to finishing a project.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dad's Visit
programme.desc: Much to Audrey's dismay, Jeff's chauvinist father, who expects Audrey to wait on him hand and foot, extends his visit after spraining his ankle. Meanwhile, Russell has a one-night stand with a woman who won't leave his apartment.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Secret
programme.desc: Audrey discovers that Russell is a closeted fan of Broadway musicals, a fact she promises to keep secret in exchange for free theater tickets. Meanwhile, Adam and Jennifer take dancing lessons in preparation for their wedding.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bustin' with Justin
programme.desc: Dog and the team must deal with misleading informants, belligerent boaters, and angry drunks when they go after Kimberly, a traffic offender with over 20 violations. And if that isn't enough, Dog has another problem - Duane Lee is sick.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Run Fugitive, Run
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Vegas or Bust
programme.desc: Dog is going to be the keynote speaker at the annual Profession Bail Agents convention in Las Vegas, but before he leaves he's got to clear two cases from his docket - Heidi and Stephanie.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Playing Possum
programme.desc: Tim's got a big problem. Owen has failed to appear in court. He's on bond for serious drug charges and now Tim could lose $30,000 if he doesn't catch Owen. With Dog's help he tries to track down the co-signer but they come up dry.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rainy Day Woman
programme.desc: It's been raining for days and the team is going a little stir crazy, but Dog has the cure; a good hunt. Maui has failed to appear on a drug charge and the team has just one lead. She was recently spotted during a bust at a local chop shop garage.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ticket to Ride
programme.desc: Dog decides it's time to outfit the Da Kine crew with new SUVs. After a quick visit to their local dealership, they go after Jasmine, a woman whose criminal record includes over 37 arrests for everything from drug promotion to assault.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources - the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then, Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rush from Judgment
programme.desc: Facing hard time for forging checks, Melissa pulled a vanishing act at her sentencing hearing, bolting from the courthouse in broad daylight. Lucky for her bondsman, Dog and his posse are in Colorado and ready to help.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Burn & Return
programme.desc: Dog is busy. First, he's after a fugitive who is allegedly an expert in the game of "burn and return"- shoplifting goods to return them for cash refunds. But he's not easy to track.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Going after two fugitives in one day is tough enough without the facing Colorado's notoriously unpredictable weather. Today, it's the threat of severe thunderstorms, hail and area wide tornado warnings.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Money
programme.desc: It hurts Dog to see people who after years of walking the straight and narrow, suddenly lose their way. But today's case is a member of the law enforcement community who has recently gone astray, and that truly troubles the Dog.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Reality Check
programme.desc: Dog is back in Denver and in hot pursuit of a woman wanted for identity theft. The sad reality is that the identify which has been robbed is her own. She's traded in a bright future for a life on the wrong side of the law.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Piece of Cake
programme.desc: Being hunted by the Dog is a lousy way to celebrate your birthday but that's exactly the spot that Robert finds himself in today. He's missed his court date, quit his job, and vacated his last known address.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prayers and Mace
programme.desc: Both brother Tim and fellow Honolulu bondsman James need Dog's help to track down their hard to find fugitives. The two cases on the docket today are challenging, especially the hunt for Gregory, a felon with a lengthy rap sheet.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: New Dog in Town
programme.desc: It's Beth's birthday and Dog knows just what she needs. He surprises Beth with Delilah, a puppy small enough to sit in the palm of her hand. Beth is so happy that she insists on taking the puppy with her on today's bounty.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: It's Halloween, and before Dog and Beth can help the kids carve their pumpkins, they have some business to attend to. It involves knocking on doors and meeting the neighbors but instead of hunting for treats they're on the search for a fugitive.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Girl Trouble
programme.desc: Dog and the team have girl trouble in this case. Krystal jumped bail and seems to have vanished into the high plains of Colorado. To make matters worse, she's running with her lover (and bond co-signer) Carrie. But Thelma and Louise they ain't.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack-O-Lantern
programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse." Everyone dresses up and Willie desperately tries to be the scariest, but none of the kids are afraid of him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.sub-title: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Boomerang Becca
programme.desc: When Rebecca returns home from her internship in Los Angeles, the Robertson family plans a big surprise party to welcome her back. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si gets sick, he seeks the help of Ms. Kay to take care of him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie's Number Two
programme.desc: When Willie is looking to hire a new assistant, Korie insists he interviews her cousin, JD. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si spends the day over at Phil and Kay's, Jep stops by with the kids to keep them away from Jessica, who has taken ill.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Life of Si
programme.desc: After seeing footage Jep shot using a GoPro, Si decides he wants to use the camera to record a day in his life. But when Si gets on the guys nerves while they're hunting, they kick him and his GoPros out of the blind.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: From Duck 'til Dawn
programme.desc: When the duck guys have to pull an all-nighter to finish some work, Willie decides he wants to join them. But when a dying smoke detector distracts them from their work, Jase and Willie head off to disarm it.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Burger Commander
programme.desc: After visiting a popular burger restaurant, Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger, prompting them to challenge one another to a cooking contest.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: G.I. Si
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old G.I. Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier. To settle the score, Willie and Jase head out to the woods with their friends and children for a paintball match.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Half in the Bag
programme.desc: After Si has started moonlighting as a grocery bagger, the guys show up at the store and their teasing inadvertently causes Si to lose his job and his chance to enter a local bagging competition.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: There Will Be Flood
programme.desc: When a large storm hits Monroe, most of the adults head to Phil and Kay's to help protect their house from flooding while Jess, Sadie, Rebecca and Cole babysit the kids. Meanwhile, Jep, Si, Martin and Godwin try to protect the Duck Commander.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bingo Star
programme.desc: Willie accompanies Kay to a local bingo tournament and gets seduced by the game, eventually embarrassing himself and Kay with his enthusiasm.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sadie's Choice
programme.desc: Willie takes Sadie on a tour of a local college in hopes of convincing her to stay nearby after her impending high school graduation.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Children of the Cornbread
programme.desc: When the Robertson brothers debate which of their wives makes the best cornbread, it escalates into a full-on cornbread cook off. Meanwhile, when Jep, Martin, and Godwin play a practical joke on Uncle Si, it ends up being Si who has the last laugh.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Whole Lotta Bull
programme.desc: The guys enjoy a one-day rodeo fantasy camp where they learn the ins and outs of riding, roping and clowning.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Comes the Son
programme.desc: After leaving school to pursue music, Jase feels that Reed needs some structure in his life, so he hires him to take his place at Duck Commander.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bro'd Trip
programme.desc: Jase accompanies Willie on a business trip to Arkansas to pitch a new product and has unorthodox sales strategies. Back in Monroe, Jep and Si have to track down an important item of Willie's that they accidentally shipped out.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie thinks his kids have been spending too much time on their phones and other devices so he initiates a "No-Tech Week," but when he has to participate too it ends up being harder than he thought. There's a lice outbreak at Duck Command.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The West Monroe Wing
programme.desc: Willie and Jase run against each other to become president of their neighborhood HOA. Jep, Jess and Miss Kay work on a Duck Commander themed display for the local zoo.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Automation Frustration
programme.desc: Willie buys a 3D printer for the office that starts off as a fun distraction for the guys until it appears the printer could soon replace their jobs. Si is upset that Willie invested in the 3D printer and didn't give him a raise.(n)

programme.title: Ultrasound
programme.desc: A dark puzzle-box sci-fi in the vein of ‘Memento’ and ‘Primer’.

programme.title: Automata
programme.desc: Jacq Vaucan (Antonio Banderas, 'The Mask of Zorro') is an insurance agent of ROC robotics corporation who investigates cases of robots violating their primary protocols against altering themselves.

programme.title: Automata
programme.desc: Jacq Vaucan (Antonio Banderas, 'The Mask of Zorro') is an insurance agent of ROC robotics corporation who investigates cases of robots violating their primary protocols against altering themselves.(n)

programme.title: Monster Hunters
programme.desc: When an alien prison ship crash lands and unleashes creature after creature in the California desert, they make quick work of the army that tries to stop them.(n)

programme.title: Target Earth
programme.desc: When aliens have infiltrated society by inhabiting bodies of select human beings, they plan a full-scale invasion of Earth. A detective finds the information that can stop the attack; however the information is in the mind of a six-year-old child.(n)

programme.title: Kill The Irishman
programme.desc: Oscar®-winner Christopher Walken, Val Kilmer, and Ray Stevenson star in KILL THE IRISHMAN, the true story of a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970s.

programme.title: Draft Day
programme.desc: It's NFL Draft Day and General Manager Sonny Weaver Jr. (Kevin Costner) faces the biggest decision of his life – the #1 pick. Will he pull off the draft of a lifetime or lose it all?(n)

programme.title: Kill The Irishman
programme.desc: Oscar®-winner Christopher Walken, Val Kilmer, and Ray Stevenson star in KILL THE IRISHMAN, the true story of a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970s.(n)

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: A blind girl receives a cornea transplant so that she is able to see again. However, she gets more than she bargains for when she realizes she can see disturbing ghosts.(n)

programme.title: Recoil
programme.desc: A cop turns vigilante after his family is murdered, exacting vengeance on the killers - and then on all criminals who have slipped through the system.

programme.title: Seized
programme.desc: A former special forces agent's son is kidnapped and must now wipe out three dangerous crime syndicates, if he wants to see his son alive again.

programme.title: Contract Killer
programme.desc: Two hitmen, one a novice and the other a veteran with poor luck, band together to find the "King of Killers" for whom there is a large reward.(n)

programme.title: Seized
programme.desc: A former special forces agent's son is kidnapped and must now wipe out three dangerous crime syndicates, if he wants to see his son alive again.(n)

programme.title: The Debt Collector
programme.desc: French is a martial artist that takes on a job as a mob debt collector in order to make ends meet. He does whatever it takes to chase down individuals until he meets a bartender that makes him question whether he should do the right thing.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Village
programme.desc: To save her reputation, Piper Jensen, a public relations genius and owner of her own PR company, agrees to work for the owner of a failing Santa’s Village and discovers love and how magical Christmas is after all.

programme.title: A Bulldog For Christmas
programme.desc: Becky really hates Christmas. But when she is magically transformed into a cute bulldog, she has to learn the meaning of Christmas and get into the holiday spirit or she may never be changed back. An entertaining Christmas film for the whole family.

programme.title: The Christmas Gift
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story. Ten-year-old Wesley puts together a "Secret Santa" gift for a needy child and when ten-year-old Megan opens the package, she discovers an item that will have a huge impact on her life to come.(n)

programme.title: Christmas in Mississippi
programme.desc: Photographer Holly returns to Gulfport, Mississippi for Christmas. Their traditional holiday light show has been revived again since a hurricane struck five years earlier. She is shocked to learn the festival is run by her high school sweetheart, Mike.(n)

programme.title: A Country Christmas Story
programme.desc: Musical icon and multiple Grammy Award winner Dolly Parton and Grammy Award nominated R&B singer and producer Brian McKnight star in this Lifetime Original Movie.(n)

programme.title: Holiday Joy
programme.desc: A shy high school student's Christmas wish comes true only it isn't exactly as wonderful as she'd hoped.(n)

programme.title: Evil Doctor
programme.desc: Expectant parents Aubrey and Matt find their lives haunted, and their marriage tested, by an unhinged OB GYN with a mysterious past and who is after their child.

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: All Around The Town
programme.desc: An innocent girl is kidnapped and held hostage for two years causing her to develop multiple personalities and making her the number one suspect when her English professor is brutally murdered.

programme.title: The Perfect Teacher
programme.desc: Starring Megan Park, David Charvet, and Boti Bliss. When spoiled, beautiful high-schooler Devon sets her sights on her handsome teacher, she won't take no for an answer - even it means putting getting his girlfriend involved.(n)

programme.title: Sugar Baby Murder
programme.desc: After graduating from college, 21 year old Bridget moves to a new town with her best friend Lindsay. Desperately needing a job to support her budding writing career, she takes a job as an EA to business tycoon Anthony Gloss.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: You Belong To Me
programme.desc: After a radio talk show host takes to the airwaves to discuss recent slayings of lonely women aboard cruise ships, she receives information that leads her to believe she knows the killer and may be the next target.(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Chief electronics technician Mike Williams (Mark Wahlberg) and other crew members fight for survival when the Deepwater Horizon drilling rig explodes on April 20, 2010, in the Gulf of Mexico.

programme.title: Survivor
programme.desc: Framed for a terrorist bombing, a foreign service officer (Milla Jovovich) must dodge a top assassin (Pierce Brosnan), while racing against time to thwart a deadly plot.

programme.title: The Man with the Iron Heart
programme.desc: In 1942, the Czech resistance in London sends two young recruits to Prague to assassinate Reinhard Heydrich, the most ruthless Nazi leader who is the Reich-protector, head of the SS and the Gestapo, and the architect of the Final Solution.(n)

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: During World War II's Battle of Okinawa, U.S. Army medic Desmond Doss (Andrew Garfield) braves bullets, grenades and snipers while single-handedly evacuating the wounded from behind enemy lines.(n)

programme.title: Gone With The West
programme.desc: After being framed, a cowboy is sent to jail. After his time is served, he leaves with vengeance in his heart. Soon he meets a young Native American woman and together they go to settle their score with a small town and its corrupt leader.

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: U.S. marshal John Carruthers observes a robbery and Sheriff Jake thinks he may be the culprit. Meanwhile the town's leading citizen is planning to rob everybody blind.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.(n)

programme.title: The Dawn Rider
programme.desc: John Mason is left wounded after his father's murder, and is hellbent on avenging it. A tense love triangle develops between him, his beautiful nurse, and his best friend.(n)

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: U.S. marshal John Carruthers observes a robbery and Sheriff Jake thinks he may be the culprit. Meanwhile the town's leading citizen is planning to rob everybody blind.(n)

programme.title: Sam Cade
programme.desc: Sam Cade is targeted for assassination when he is scheduled to testify against a man kingpin.(n)

programme.title: K9 Legend Of The Lost Gold
programme.desc: When Kassie and her friends stumble across an old, broken pocket watch they begin an unexpected journey to unlock the secret of the legendary Garrison Gold. They'll have to solve clues to find the lost treasure.

programme.title: For The Love Of Benji
programme.desc: Benji is back! En route to a vacation in Greece Benji becomes separated from the family in Athens, Benji finds himself on the run from an assortment of international spies seeking an energy scientist, who has been working on a secret formula.

programme.title: The Stolen Princess
programme.desc: In the age of knights, princesses and sorcerers, Ruslan embarks on a quest for his stolen princess and to prove, that love is stronger than magic.(n)

programme.title: Witches of Oz: Episode 1
programme.desc: Dorothy Gale writes children's books based on the Land of Oz created by her grandfather. Her life turns upside down when she learns that Oz is real and she must stop the Wicked Witch.(n)

programme.title: Witches of Oz: Episode 2
programme.desc: Dorothy Gale writes children's books based on the Land of Oz created by her grandfather. Her life turns upside down when she learns that Oz is real and she must stop the Wicked Witch.(n)

programme.title: Fanboys
programme.desc: A group of Star Wars fans travel to Skywalker Ranch to steal a copy of 'The Phantom Menace,' so that their terminally ill friend can see it before its release in theaters several months down the line.

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Deep inside the most secure bank in America, three desperate women from very different worlds cook up the most unlikely heist of the century: Smuggle out millions of dollars in worn-out currency headed for a Federal Reserve shredder every day.

programme.title: Death Of A Ladies Man
programme.desc: Inspired by the work of Leonard Cohen and set to some of his most beloved music, Death Of A Ladies' Man tells the story of the womanising poetry professor, Samuel O’Shea, who spirals when he realises that he is suffering from hallucinations.(n)

programme.title: Fanboys
programme.desc: A group of Star Wars fans travel to Skywalker Ranch to steal a copy of 'The Phantom Menace,' so that their terminally ill friend can see it before its release in theaters several months down the line.(n)

programme.title: Death Of A Ladies Man
programme.desc: Inspired by the work of Leonard Cohen and set to some of his most beloved music, Death Of A Ladies' Man tells the story of the womanising poetry professor, Samuel O’Shea, who spirals when he realises that he is suffering from hallucinations.(n)

programme.title: Love, Life and Laughter
programme.desc: A young man of royalty falls in love with the daughter of a pub owner, but is compelled by duty to return to the throne.

programme.title: The Naked Truth
programme.desc: Four high profile personalities band together to bump off a tabloid magazine publisher who threatens to expose their dark secrets.

programme.title: The Proud Valley
programme.desc: An African American finds a job in a mining community in Wales, where he wins over the music loving locals with his singing. While there, he shares in the struggles of their lives and fights to improve their working conditions.(n)

programme.title: Sapphire
programme.desc: In 1950s London racial hostility to Commonwealth immigrants is openly paraded. Scotland Yard detectives probe the racially motivated murder of a young woman.(n)

programme.title: R.A.F
programme.desc: Documentary about the Royal Air Force featuring training of new recruits and aircraft of the period.(n)

programme.title: Rockets Galore
programme.desc: Residents of a small island in the Atlantic resist their government's plan to make their home a missile base.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Take My Life... Please!//Devil's Alphabet/The Library
programme.sub-title: Take My Life... Please!//Devil's Alphabet/The Library
programme.desc: A comedian killed by his rival finds himself in a strange stage show; something's off/In Victorian England, Cambridge grads are bound by an oath even in death/A woman starts at an odd library.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Shadow Play/Grace Note
programme.desc: A condemned man, Adam Grant, insists that everything and everyone around him is a dream: one that he can't wake up from/An aspiring opera singer gets an inspiring glimpse of her future, courtesy of a dying wish by her youngest sister.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: A day in Beaumont/The Last Defender of Camelot
programme.sub-title: A day in Beaumont/The Last Defender of Camelot
programme.desc: In the 1950s a flying saucer crashes on Earth. The crash is seen by a couple but no one believes them/Sir Lancelot seeks the help of the sleeping Merlin in one final battle. But he soon finds himself facing off against the revived wizard.

programme.title: Steven Spielberg Presents Taken
programme.desc: Allie's (Dakota Fanning) parents conspire to save their alien-hybrid daughter\nfrom the army's clutches, only to learn just how much power Allie (Dakota\nFanning) really possesses.(n)

programme.title: Steven Spielberg Presents Taken
programme.desc: In the finale, Allie (Dakota Fanning) learns of her true destiny and together the\nfamily must make the most difficult decision of their lives.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Curious Case of Edgar Witherspoon
programme.sub-title: The Curious Case of Edgar Witherspoon
programme.desc: A woman tries to get her Uncle Edgar committed, believing that he is senile. The investigating doctor finds Edgar living in an apartment containing all kinds of junk.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Extra Innings
programme.desc: Ex-baseball player Ed Hamler, lame from an injury and forced to retire early is given a 1909 baseball card of a player that looks exactly like him. The card is magical in that he becomes drawn into it and lives out the life of the player in the past.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Crossing
programme.desc: A stressed-out priest repeatedly encounters a station wagon containing a young girl. The car keeps crashing and bursting into flames.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Hunters
programme.desc: A young boy falls into an undiscovered cave near a housing project. An archeologist studies strange paintings on its walls and then bizarre things begin to happen. Cave items move around and animals are killed and brought into the cave.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Fugue
programme.desc: FBI Agent Abby Corrigan's life is endangered after she is suddenly attacked by an unfamiliar abnormal during an investigation. Magnus and Will's heated debate over the best way to help Abby threatens to permanently alter their relationship.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Chimera
programme.desc: There is a sentient organic nanite causing havoc in the computer system in the Sanctuary. Magnus and Tesla connect their minds to the system in an effort to isolate the nanite. They find Adam Worth instead.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Acolyte
programme.desc: A radical group of abnormal beings plan a terrorist attack with the goal of starting a war between surface dwellers and hollow Earth inhabitants. To Magnus' disbelief, Addison, at the NSA, has proof of Biggie's leadership of the group.

programme.title: Sanctuary: The Depths
programme.desc: When Magnus and Will learn of a plan to capture very rare and dangerous Abnormal, they travel to a remote cave to prevent then hunt.

programme.title: Dresden Files
programme.desc: Dresden takes on the case of a father being haunted by his daughter, but the circumstances of her murder send Harry in a different direction that endangers Connie.(n)

programme.title: Dresden Files
programme.desc: The FBI takes over Murphy's case involving a serial killer who takes the hair and teeth of the victim, but the reason may be for more than catching the killer.(n)

programme.title: Dresden Files
programme.desc: Harry uncovers a distasteful alliance while trying to protect his client from a hellion.(n)

programme.title: Dresden Files
programme.desc: Dresden gets himself mixed up in a turf war between vampire gangs when he's pressured to repay a debt.(n)

programme.title: Dresden Files
programme.desc: When a man drops dead in Harry's office, Harry is led to investigate a complex murder plot with ties to Bob's past.(n)
